doc.name: scrollbarEnd
doc.summary: Sent to a scrollbar when the user Shift-clicks its increase arrow.

examples.example:
on scrollbarEnd -- use a scroll bar to navigate among cards
visual effect scroll up
go last card
end scrollbarEnd

description.p: Handle the scrollbarEnd message if you want to respond to the use of Shift-click to move the scrollbar thumb directly to the end (the bottom or right) of the scrollbar.
The end is the new position of the scrollbar thumb. This is the same as the scrollbar's endValue property.
Dragging the scrollbar thumb to the end position, or otherwise moving it to the end, does not send a scrollbarEnd message.
If the scrollbarEnd message is not handled, a scrollbarDrag message is sent in addition.
